resources.string: Waiting for user permission to start VPN
You must choose a user certificate
Disconnected connected VPN / Cancel connection attempt?

On some custom ICS system versions, the permissions for /dev/tun may be incorrect or there may be no such file at all. CM9 system users please try to fix the permissions through the repair option in the program settings.
Interface information obtained %1$s as well as %2$s，Use the second address as the remote address. use /32 As a local mask. The mode given by the VPN is \"%3$s\"。
Unable to %1$s 和 %2$s As CIDR Formal routing that will be used /32 Subnet mask.

Cannot access the Android keychain certificate. This may be due to a firmware upgrade or by restoring the backed up application/software settings. Edit the VPN profile and re-select the certificate in the basic settings to recreate the certificate access.
No IP information, refuse to open tun device
No CA certificate was found in the Android keystore. Possible verification failed.
With the Android keystore %1$s Error while signing： %2$s

If you are not using a DNS server and cannot resolve the domain name, consider setting up a DNS server. Note that even if you don\'t have a DNS server set up, the proxy settings you set for mobile networks and Wi-Fi are also valid.
Unable to add DNS server \"%1$s\", %2$s has rejected your operation.
Unable to configure IP address %1$s, rejected by system: %2$s
VPN unexpectedly crashes. It is recommended that you send a dump file to the developer using the Send Dump File feature in the main menu.

Some versions of Android 4.1 have problems if the name of the keystore certificate contains non-alphanumeric characters (such as spaces, underscores, or dashes). Please try to re-import a certificate that does not contain special characters
Pause when the screen is closed: less than %1$s in %2$s seconds
Warning: The VPN does not have "persistent tun device" enabled. When the screen is closed, network traffic will not go through the VPN tunnel, but will go to Wi-Fi or mobile network.
Suspended as requested by the user VPN
The VPN topology "%3$s" is specified, but using ifconfig %1$s %2$s looks more like the IP address of a netmask. Assume the topology of the "subnet".
Remove it from the application\'s allow forbidden list, no longer install the package %s
You need to define and enable at least one remote server.
Restart the VPN service (application crash - may be a real crash or was killed due to insufficient memory)
No allowed applications have been added. Join this app (%s) to ensure at least one app in the list of allowed apps to block all other apps
Preferred native ABI precedence of this device (%1$s) and ABI reported by native libraries (%2$s) mismatch
VPN permissions are revoked by the operating system (such as other VPN programs started), VPN is stopped
Missing user certificate or user certificate key file
Reread (%d) log items from the log cache file
%s seconds have been waited during connection retry
Network is Not Available , Please check you internet connection
Connecting takes too long to connect, Please refresh the server and try again

Introduction 
Quantum VPN lets you easily to connect to a number of free VPN server around the world with just a single tap! The list of servers the application connect is http://www.vpngate.net VPN Gate Academic Experiment Project is an online service as an academic research at Graduate School of University of Tsukuba, Japan. The purpose of this research is to expand the knowledge of "Global Distributed Public VPN Relay Servers". 

 Why VPN Gate? 
You can take these advantages by using VPN Gate: 
 * It is about 8531 Public VPN Relay Servers by volunteers around the world. 
 * You can disguise your IP address to hide your identity while surfing the Internet. 
 * You can protect yourself by utilizing its strong encryption while using public Wi-Fi. 
Unlike traditional VPN services, VPN Gate can get through most firewalls. 
VPN Gate is free of charge. Not a single registration is required. 

 License 
 Free Software! 
https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html 
This application uses some Easy VPN methods 
 * Easy VPN-Free https://github.com/MaxSmile/EasyVPN-Free 
This application uses the following components; see the source code for full details on the licenses. 
 * OpenVPN for Android https://github.com/schwabe/ics-openvpn under GPLv2 
 * Material Drawer https://github.com/zsmb13/MaterialDrawerKt 
 * Fast-Android-Networking https://github.com/amitshekhariitbhu/Fast-Android-Networking under Apache 2.0

if the connecting take so long, try to refresh the servers or use another server
